author: EXM7777
text:
if you ask me, this is still so early...

whop solves deep problems for 3 categories:

- giving consumers interactive AI-powered experiences via apps, courses, lives... truly next-gen education

- innovating on Services-as-a-Software by packaging your offer into automated systems that deliver high-quality service and generate upsells

- empowering creators with tools, apps, and visibility to deliver more than courses

as a developer or marketer, you can tap into all three using AI

very bullish on whop
